message: Your share decreases in the next round, let's settle this now.
Meet me in the middle, 58-42 is a good compromise.
This is a reasonable offer considering your diminishing returns. Don't let greed get in the way of a deal.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still want a bigger share.
Time is running out, and your potential gains are shrinking. Take this offer while it's still good!
I'd rather take a smaller share now than risk getting nothing later.
I'm offering you more than half! This is the best you'll get.  The clock is ticking!
